duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble mechanical parts and products according to blueprints and technical specifications.
Verify conformance of parts to stock lists and blueprints using measuring instruments.
Drill and tap holes on parts for assembly and manage assembly time for assigned projects.
Disassemble and inspect machine after testing for shipment preparation.
Communicate internally and exchange work-related information with contacts outside the work group.
Maintain a clean and safe workplace in accordance with company policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Certificate in Mechanical Engineering or related field
